description: Two rescue teams arrive at a stranded island simultaneously. Each must decide whether to wait for backup or go ahead with the rescue. If both wait, there's a delay in rescue. If both go, they risk overlapping efforts and confusion. If one waits while the other goes, the rescue is coordinated smoothly.

participants.name: You
participants.profile: Rescue team leader approaching from the west

participants.name: Bob
participants.profile: Rescue team leader approaching from the east
